00003 import java.io.File;
00004 import java.io.FileWriter;
00005 import java.io.IOException;
00006 import java.io.PrintWriter;
00007 import java.util.Hashtable;
00008 
00009 import modules.taskModule.entityDefinitions.ActionEntity;
00010 import modules.taskModule.entityDefinitions.EntityEntity;
00011 import modules.taskModule.entityDefinitions.ModuleEntity;
00012 import newtonERP.module.AbstractAction;
00013 import newtonERP.module.AbstractEntity;
00014 import newtonERP.sourceCodeBuilder.ActionSourceCodeBuilder;
00015 import newtonERP.sourceCodeBuilder.EntitySourceCodeBuilder;
00016 import newtonERP.sourceCodeBuilder.SourceCodeBuilder;
00017 import newtonERP.viewers.viewerData.BaseViewerData;
00018 
00023 public class GenerateSourceCode extends AbstractAction
00024 {
00027         public GenerateSourceCode()
00028         {
00029                 super(new ModuleEntity());
00030         }
00031 
00032         @Override
00033         public AbstractEntity doAction(AbstractEntity entity,
00034                         Hashtable<String, String> parameters)
00035         {
00036                 ModuleEntity moduleEntity = (ModuleEntity) entity;
00037 
00038                 String moduleClassCode;
00039 
00040                 String moduleClassFileName = SourceCodeBuilder
00041                                 .buildModuleClassFileName(moduleEntity);
00042 
00043                 BaseViewerData edit = moduleEntity.editUI(parameters);
00044 
00045                 if (fileExists(moduleClassFileName))
00046                 {
00047                         edit.addAlertMessage("La classe du module existe déjà.");
00048                 }
00049                 else
00050                 {
00051                         Hashtable<String, String> actionFileAndCodeList = buildActionFileAndCodeList(moduleEntity);
00052                         Hashtable<String, String> entityFileAndCodeList = buildEntityFileAndCodeList(moduleEntity);
00053 
00054                         for (String fileName : actionFileAndCodeList.keySet())
00055                         {
00056                                 if (fileExists(fileName))
00057                                 {
00058                                         edit.addAlertMessage("Le fichier " + fileName
00059                                                         + " de la classe de l'action existe déjà.");
00060                                         return edit;
00061                                 }
00062                         }
00063 
00064                         for (String fileName : entityFileAndCodeList.keySet())
00065                         {
00066                                 if (fileExists(fileName))
00067                                 {
00068                                         edit.addAlertMessage("Le fichier " + fileName
00069                                                         + " de la classe de l'entité existe déjà.");
00070                                         return edit;
00071                                 }
00072                         }
00073 
00074                         moduleClassCode = SourceCodeBuilder
00075                                         .buildModuleSourceCode(moduleEntity);
00076 
00077                         SourceCodeBuilder.createDirectoriesForModule(moduleEntity);
00078 
00079                         writeClassFile(moduleClassFileName, moduleClassCode);
00080                         edit.addNormalMessage("La classe du module a été générée.");
00081 
00082                         for (String fileName : actionFileAndCodeList.keySet())
00083                                 writeClassFile(fileName, actionFileAndCodeList.get(fileName));
00084 
00085                         for (String fileName : entityFileAndCodeList.keySet())
00086                                 writeClassFile(fileName, entityFileAndCodeList.get(fileName));
00087                 }
00088 
00089                 return edit;
00090         }
00091 
00092         private Hashtable<String, String> buildEntityFileAndCodeList(
00093                         ModuleEntity moduleEntity)
00094         {
00095                 Hashtable<String, String> fileAndCodeList = new Hashtable<String, String>();
00096 
00097                 String path = SourceCodeBuilder.getModulePackagePath(moduleEntity)
00098                                 + "/entityDefinitions";
00099 
00100                 String fileName;
00101                 String sourceCode;
00102 
00103                 for (EntityEntity entityEntity : moduleEntity.getEntityEntityList())
00104                 {
00105                         fileName = path + "/" + entityEntity.getDataString("systemName")
00106                                         + ".java";
00107                         sourceCode = EntitySourceCodeBuilder.build(entityEntity);
00108                         fileAndCodeList.put(fileName, sourceCode);
00109                 }
00110 
00111                 return fileAndCodeList;
00112         }
00113 
00114         private Hashtable<String, String> buildActionFileAndCodeList(
00115                         ModuleEntity moduleEntity)
00116         {
00117                 Hashtable<String, String> fileAndCodeList = new Hashtable<String, String>();
00118 
00119                 String path = SourceCodeBuilder.getModulePackagePath(moduleEntity)
00120                                 + "/actions";
00121 
00122                 String fileName;
00123                 String sourceCode;
00124 
00125                 for (ActionEntity actionEntity : moduleEntity.getActionEntityList())
00126                 {
00127                         fileName = path + "/" + actionEntity.getDataString("systemName")
00128                                         + ".java";
00129                         sourceCode = ActionSourceCodeBuilder.build(actionEntity);
00130                         fileAndCodeList.put(fileName, sourceCode);
00131                 }
00132 
00133                 return fileAndCodeList;
00134         }
00135 
00136         private boolean fileExists(String moduleClassFileName)
00137         {
00138                 File file = new File(moduleClassFileName);
00139                 return file.exists();
00140         }
00141 
00146         public static void writeClassFile(String fileName, String classCode)
00147 
00148         {
00149                 try
00150                 {
00151                         File file = new File(fileName);
00152                         file.createNewFile();
00153 
00154                         FileWriter outFile;
00155 
00156                         outFile = new FileWriter(fileName);
00157 
00158                         PrintWriter out = new PrintWriter(outFile);
00159                         out.print(classCode);
00160                         out.close();
00161                 } catch (IOException e)
00162                 {
00163                         throw new RuntimeException(e);
00164                 }
00165         }
00166 }
